byline.contributor: Julie Turkewitz reported from Colorado Springs, and Jack Healy from Steamboat Springs, Colo. Noel Black contributed reporting from Colorado Springs, Michael Schmidt from Washington, D.C., and Dave Philipps, Christine Hauser and Erik Eckholm from New York.
byline.original: By JULIE TURKEWITZ and JACK HEALY

abstract: Three people are killed and nine others are wounded in standoff between police officers and 57-year-old Robert Lewis Dear at Planned Parenthood center in Colorado Springs, Colo; authorities are unsure of motive and do not yet know whether Colorado Springs center had been specifically targeted.
lead_paragraph: A police officer and two civilians were killed and the authorities arrested a suspect, suggesting he had brought explosive devices with him.

headline.main: 3 Are Dead in Colorado Springs Shootout at Planned Parenthood Center
headline.print_headline: Three Are Killed in Siege At Clinic; Suspect is Held

snippet: A police officer and two civilians were killed and the authorities arrested a suspect, suggesting he had brought explosive devices with him.
